column2: Order a [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] of the highest quality. This weapon will give you a significant bonus to §YLight Infantry§! and §YHeavy Foot Troops§!, as well as §YMartial§!, §YPersonal Combat Skill§! and §YMonthly Prestige§!.

Order a [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] of the highest quality. This weapon will give you a significant bonus to §YPikemen§! and §YMounted Troops§!, as well as §YMartial§!, §YPersonal Combat Skill§! and §YMonthly Prestige§!.
